'''Linden Wood "Sweet Slumber" Bed''' is a creatable [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for Linden Wood "Sweet Slumber" Bed is obtainable from a [[Remarkable Chest]] in [[Fontaine]].

==How to Obtain==
Obtained from a Remarkable Chest in [[Morte Region]], [[Fontaine]].
